titles.title: Directing the Chief Administrative Officer of the House of Representatives to conduct a study and issue a report about ways to increase the accessability of live broadcasts of floor proceedings of the House of Representatives to individuals without cable or satellite television, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: This resolution requires a study on how to increase the accessibility of live broadcasts of House floor proceedings for those without cable or satellite television, including through the use of streaming services and software applications.
